name: Equilibre des Energies
goal: EdEn is a transversal platform regrouping industry, civil society and experts from the energy, construction and mobility sectors, all engaged in the European energy transition with one common goal: to make a better energy society in a decarbonised economy.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: 2030 climate and energy framework, 2050 climate and energy objectives, Energy efficiency, Energy performance of buildings, Eco-design, Energy labelling, Renewables, Transports, ETS, Digital Single Market
